title: Please tell me that there is a Santa Bard in the making
body: I really hope that this is already in the works because it just seems far to perfect. Bard already has a beard and he resembles Santas classic look in the first place, but it would need a few touch ups here and there. Also, the meeps would be given a green skin resembling elves. As for the abilities, his Q (Cosmic Binding) would be wrapping paper or a bow. If it stuns then  the stunned target will appear to have a bow wrapped around them. His W (Caretakers Shrine) would be milk and cookies on a plate and his chimes would be Christmas presents, or vice versa.  His E (Magical Journey) would likely stay the same except a wreath would appear at the front of the gate. As for his R (Tempered Fate) it could either remain the same, freeze targets in a snowstorm, or wrap everyone in wrapping paper.
